nz.govt.natlib.fx
Interface ParserEvent

public interface ParserEvent

A ParserEvent is an event fired from within an Adapter

1.0

Nic Evans

Method Detail

getID

int getID()
Returns:
the Type of event that this event is.

getValue

java.lang.Object getValue()
Returns:
the value of the event

getParent

ParserContext getParent()
Returns:
the ParserContext of this event - not really used much

getPath

java.lang.String getPath()
Returns:
the path (dot delimited) of the event within the structure of the file being parsed

isInternal

boolean isInternal()
Returns:
true if the event is an internal event - some listeners MAY implement specific behaviour for this type of event for instance a listener that outputs XML may elect NOT to output this value

getParameterNames

java.lang.String[] getParameterNames()
Returns:
the names of the parameters associated with this event. Again, listeners may choose what to do with these

Gets a parameter by it's name.

Returns:
The parameter value.
